description: Handcrafted Wooden Bowl - Perfect for Serving and Decor
Scented Candle in Ceramic Jar - Handmade candle with lavender scent, molded in a hand-painted ceramic jar. Ideal for relaxation, decoration, and aromatherapy.
Handwoven Macramé Wall Hanging -  A beautiful handwoven macramé wall hanging made with natural cotton rope. Perfect for adding a bohemian touch to your living space or bedroom.
Handmade Ceramic Planter - Ideal for indoor plants and modern decor
Recycled Glass Vase - Eco-friendly vase crafted from repurposed glass
Bamboo Serving Tray - Lightweight and durable tray for snacks and drinks
Cotton Throw Blanket - Soft and breathable blanket for cozy evenings
Leather Journal - Hand-stitched journal with recycled paper pages
Aroma Diffuser Set - Includes ceramic diffuser and essential oils
Woven Lamp Shade - Natural fiber lamp shade for warm ambient lighting
